name: dfcleq
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffss(s0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffss(s0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffss(s0, hs1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffss(s0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| diffss(s0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffss(hs0, s0)

|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| diffss(s0, hs1)
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffss(hs1, s0)

|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wb(wceq(c0, c1), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: The same as ~ df-cleq with the hypothesis removed using the Axiom of Extensionality ~ ax-ext . (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-1993.) Revised to make use of ~ axext3 instead of ~ ax-ext , so that ~ ax-9 will appear in lists of axioms used by a proof, since ~ df-cleq implies ~ ax-9 by theorem ~ bj-ax9 . We may revisit this in the future. (Revised by NM, 28-Oct-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
